radiographic_examinations.findings: Generalised cerebral oedema and obliteration of the suprasellar cistern, suggestive of uncal herniation.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Cerebral oedema resolved on repeat CT scan after 48 hours, showing normal appearance.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal, other than a small focus of abnormal signal in the corpus callosum.
